Name: Pixels can fight
About the game: Four friends break a mysterious crystal and move to another dimension, where adventure awaits them. Pixels can fight is a fun platformer that will challenge you and your friends. The game has 96 levels in 12 worlds, 12 bosses and 132 PVP arenas. Supports split screen and LAN play for 4 people.
